Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Death Glare, The Hag targets a frightened creature.  The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, dropping to 0 HP on a failure
Other Actions.Action 2: Illusory Appearance, The Hag can use materials and magic to create an image to appear as any creature or humanoid she'd like

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Hag can breathe air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Horrific Appearance, Creature's that can see the Hag's true appearance must make a Wisdom saving throw, becoming frightened of the Hag on a failure
